chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)
items.plainText: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)

items.text: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:
items.plainText: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:

items.text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,
items.plainText: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,

items.text: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:
items.plainText: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:

items.text: To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
items.plainText: To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

items.text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:
items.plainText: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:

items.text: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.
items.plainText: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.

items.text: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
items.plainText: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.

items.text: As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.
items.plainText: As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.

items.text: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.
items.plainText: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.

items.text: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.
items.plainText: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.

items.text: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught it, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.
items.plainText: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught it, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.

items.text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews' religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:
items.plainText: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews' religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:

items.text: And profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.
items.plainText: And profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.

items.text: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called me by his grace,
items.plainText: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called me by his grace,

items.text: To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:
items.plainText: To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:

items.text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.
items.plainText: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.

items.text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.
items.plainText: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.

items.text: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord's brother.
items.plainText: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord's brother.

items.text: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.
items.plainText: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.

items.text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;
items.plainText: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;

items.text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:
items.plainText: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:

items.text: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.
items.plainText: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.

items.text: And they glorified God in me.
items.plainText: And they glorified God in me.
